title: Premature (Early) Ejaculation
description: A comprehensive guide to Premature (Early) Ejaculation, including diagnosis, management, and clinical considerations based on DSM-5 criteria.
publicSummary: Premature (Early) Ejaculation is a mental health condition classified in the DSM-5 under Sexual Dysfunctions. This content provides educational information based on current clinical guidelines and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
